text: يايها الذين ءامنوا۟ هل ادلكم على تجرة تنجيكم من عذاب اليم

translations.translation: You who have iman! shall I direct you to a transaction which will save you from a painful punishment?
O you who believe, may I offer you a bargain which will save you from a painful punishment?
Believers, shall I direct you to a commerce that will deliver you from a grievous chastisement?
Believers, shall I show you a bargain which will save you from the painful torment?
O People who Believe! Shall I show you a trade that can save you from the painful punishment?
O you who believe! Shall I guide you to a trade that will save you from a painful torment
O you who believe! shall I lead you to a merchandise which may deliver you from a painful chastisement?
O believers, shall I direct you to a commerce that shall deliver you from a painful chastisement?
O ye who believe! Shall I show you a commerce that will save you from a painful doom?
Believers! Shall I guide you to a profitable course that will save you from a painful punishment?
O ye who believe! shall direct you to a merchandise that will deliver you from a torment afflictive?
O you who have faith! Shall I show you a deal that will deliver you from a painful punishment?
O ye who believe! Shall I lead you to a bargain that will save you from a grievous Penalty?-
O You who believe! Shall I guide you to a commerce that will save you from a painful torment.
Believers! Shall I direct you to a commerce that will save you from a painful punishment?
O you who believe! Shall I inform you of a trade that will save you from a painful torment?
O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment?
[61:10] O you who believe, shall I show you a commerce that will deliver you (read tunjīkum or tunajjīkum) from a painful chastisement? It is as if they had replied, ‘Yes’, so that He then says:
(0 ye who believe!) And He explained who they are at the beginning of the surah (Shall I show you a commerce that will save you from a painful doom) in the Hereafter?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ثمَّ قال سبحاه بعدما أشار إلى ظهور دين الإسلام
 وإعلاء كلمة التوحيد حثاً على المؤمنين
 وترغيباً لهم إلى ترويج الدين القويم الذي هو الصراط المستقيم
 الموصل إلى مرتبة حق اليقين: { يٰأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ آمَنُواْ هَلْ أَدُلُّكمْ عَلَىٰ تِجَارَةٍ تُنجِيكُم مِّنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ } [الصف: 10] كأنه قيل: ما التجارة المنقذة المنجية؟


قال سبحانه: { تُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَتُجَاهِدُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ } لترويج دينه

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: يقول الحق جلّ جلاله: { يا أيها الذين آمنوا هل أَدُلُّكُمْ على تجارةٍ تُنجِيكم من عذابٍ أليم } ، وكأنهم قالوا: وما هذه التجارة، أو: ماذا نصنع؟ فقال: { تؤمنون بالله ورسوله وتُجاهدون في سبيل الله بأموالكم وأنفُسِكم } ، وهو خبر بمعنى الأمر، أي: وجاهِدوا، وجيء به بصيغة الخبر للإيذان بوجوب الامتثال، فكأنه قد وقع، فأخبر بوقوعه، وقرىء " تؤمنوا " و " تجاهدوا " على إضمار لام الأمر
